divs: Sighting Detailsme and a friend was coming from my anunts house which is in the hills of ky where there mountain that all arounds us we look up and seen a blue light with yellow and orange around in crossing the sky with a tie of light behind it then it went from one side of the mountain to the other side we got scared and took off and ever seen it again.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Evarts
There were no other sightings in Evarts on or around December 23rd 1990
Summary: i like to know what i seen in the sky over ky
